concept.title: 219.303 Determining North American Industry Classification System codes and size standards.

conbody.p: Contracting officers shall follow the procedures for “Correctly Identifying Size Status of Contractors” in the OUSD(AT&L)DPAP memorandum dated July 21, 2010.
